Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ClipPress clip where the recognizer has to extract the text from
ClipLocationLocation of a press clip inside a newspaper page
NessieExceptionException raised by a Nessie OCR object
PreprocessorPreprocessor of the OCR process
RecognizerManager of the whole OCR process
SegmenterSegmenter of the OCR process
ShapeThe shape of a character in a press clip
StatisticsStatistical data regarding the text recognition process
TextText extracted by the recognizer
